AVOD.IS.long_name: A.V.O.D. Kurutulmus Gida ve Tarim Ürünleri A.S.
AVOD.IS.summary: A.V.O.D. Kurutulmus Gida ve Tarim ÃrÃ¼nleri A.S. provides dried vegetables and derivatives, and vegetable based convenience foods under the Farmer`s Choice brand name in Turkey. Its products include sun dried tomatoes, oven semi dried tomatoes, sauces and bruschettas, fermented vegetables and grilled products, and grilled vegetables. The company serves hotels, restaurants, and the catering industry, as well as retail chains. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

BANVT.IS.long_name: Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi
BANVT.IS.summary: Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi, a food company, provides raw chicken and turkey, sauced, ready-to-eat cooked, and delicatessen products in Turkey. It primarily engages in the business of marketing, slaughtering, production of animal feed, and breeding eggs, as well as one-day-old chicks, live turkeys and chickens, and processed turkeys and chickens. The company is also involved in the energy production activities; and provision of meat based products, such as cooked meatballs, kebabs, gyros, burgers, and coated products, as well as salami, sausages, and franks. It also exports its products to Azerbaijan, Macedonia, Kosovo, Northern Cyprus, Hong Kong, China, Georgia, Togo, Jordan, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, and Benin. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Balikesir, Turkey. Banvit Bandirma Vitaminli Yem Sanayii Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of TBQ Foods GmbH.

DARDL.IS.summary: Dardanel Onentas Gida Sanayi A.S. provides canned fish products in Turkey. It offers tuna, little fish, ready meals, salmon, gourmet products, fish soups, and other fish products. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ERSU.IS.long_name: Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S.
ERSU.IS.summary: Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S. manufactures and sells fruit concentrates and pulp juices in Turkey and internationally. The company offers clear products, including pear, quince, blackberry, apple, raspberry, sourcherry, pomegranate, black carrot, grape, carrot, and Ã§ilek juice concentrates; cloudy products, such as peach, apricot, and plum juice concentrates; and citrus fruit products consisting of orange, grapefruit, and lemon juice concentrates. It also provides puree products comprising pear, strawberry, apple, plum, fig, apricot, and peach puree; and tomato paste. In addition, the company offers pomegranate, apple, orange, black carrot, and grape juices; and fruit nectars, such as freemix, mixed fruit, apricot, orange, peach, and sour cherry nectars, as well as lemonade. The company distributes its products through a network of 9 regional directorates, as well as approximately 100 distributors. It serves retail sales points, as well as military facilities, hospital cafes, schools and sport complexes, catering, etc. Ersu Meyve ve Gida Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1969 and is based in Konya, Turkey.

FADE.IS.long_name: Fade Gida Yatirim Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
FADE.IS.summary: Fade Gida Yatirim Sanayi Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the food business. The company provides salted/sulphured sun dried tomatoes. It sells its organic products to its customers worldwide. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

FRIGO.IS.long_name: Frigo-Pak Gida Maddeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
FRIGO.IS.summary: Frigo-Pak Gida Maddeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells carbonated and still drinks, fruit juices, and canned and frozen foods in Turkey. It offers apple, orange, peach, mango, apricot, pineapple, and lemon juices. The company also provides frozen fruits and vegetables; canned foods, such as citrus, plums, red kidney beans, sour and sweet cherries, and strawberries, as well as pepper products; and fruit and vegetable purees, including pastes and sauces. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KERVT.IS.long_name: Kerevitas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KERVT.IS.summary: Kerevitas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and trades in frozen foods in Turkey. The company offers frozen and canned products, including bakery products, such as pizza, pastry, puff, pastry, Turkish ravioli, flatbread, and Turkish pizza; fruits and vegetables; meat products comprising meatballs, burgers, and chicken products; tuna fish and sweet corn; desserts, consisting of Knafeh, pistachio pastry, and mosaic cake; and seafood products, such as calamari and shrimps under the SuperFresh brand. It also provides margarine, pastry and catering, and industrial and edible oils under the Bizim Yag, Teremyag, Luna, Sabah, Yayla, Halk, Ona, Evet, Ustam, Akbis, Akao, Akrim, Arma, Mars, and SPY brand names. It is also involved in the generation of electricity; and production, trading, marketing, and export of agricultural and animal products. It offers its products through dealers and direct distribution channels, as well as exports its products to approximately 60 countries in Africa, Asia, Europe, South America, and North America. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Kerevitas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Yildiz Holding A.S.

KNFRT.IS.long_name: Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KNFRT.IS.summary: Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells fruit and vegetable juice concentrates, fruit puree, and puree concentrates in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Konfrut Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of DÃ¶hler Gida Sanayi A.S.

MERKO.IS.long_name: Merko Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
MERKO.IS.summary: Merko Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a processor and exporter of tomatoes into the raw material for the food industry worldwide. It processes tomatoes into tomato paste and diced tomato for industrial applications, as well as tomato juice concentrates. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

METRO.IS.long_name: Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S.
METRO.IS.summary: Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S. operates in tourism, food, mining, and energy sectors. The company operates a fleet of buses under the METRO brand in Turkey and internationally; offers maintenance, repair, and spare parts for Metro buses; and operates 25 petrol stations and 59 stopover facilities. It is also involved in the breeding, rearing, caring, fattening, butchering, conservation, purchase, and sale of sheep, cattle, bovine, and poultry. In addition, the company engages in the gross or direct sale of electricity to consumers. Further, it extracts, processes, enriches, refines, buys, and rents its under and above ground ores and natural resources. Additionally, the company operates as a tour operator; engages in warehousing activities; and invests in a cake factory, paddy factory, fruit garden, and hotel. The company was formerly known as Van-Et A.S. Metro Ticari ve Mali Yatirimlar Holding A.S. was founded in 1977 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

PENGD.IS.summary: Penguen Gida Sanayi A.S. produces and sells fruit and vegetable products in Turkey. The company's products include jam, preserved vegetables, ready meals, preserved boiled legumes, tomato and pepper pastes, pickles, delicatessen, sauces and spreads, preserves, and frozen food products. It offers its products to national and local market chains, and middle-sized retailers, as well as mass consumption channels, such as hotels, restaurants, and cafeterias. The company exports its products to 35 countries, including Germany, the United States, France, the Netherlands, Switzerland, Russia, and Sweden. Penguen Gida Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Bursa, Turkey.

PETUN.IS.long_name: Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S.
PETUN.IS.summary: Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. produces and sells meat and by-products of cattle, sheep, poultry, and fish under the Pinar brand in Turkey. It offers delicatessen products, including soudjouks, salamis, sausages, hams, smoked meats, roasted meat products, and pastramis; frozen meat products, such as burgers, meatballs, doners, and breaded meat products; and frozen dough products comprising pizzas, puff pastries, mantis, boreks, and boyoz products. The company also provides frozen seafood products consisting of shrimps, sliced squids, and breaded seafood products, as well as anchovy, sardine, and haddock products; and unprocessed meat products, such as unprocessed turkey, beef, and lamb products. It serves hotels, restaurants, catering companies, and schools. The company also exports its products. Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar Entegre Et ve Un Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

PNSUT.IS.summary: Pinar SÃ¼t Mamulleri Sanayii A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the processing, production, and sale of milk and dairy products in Turkey. It offers milk, butter, cheese, yoghurts, kefir, ayrans, creams, fruit juices and drinks, flavors, desserts, delicatessens, convenience foods, sea foods, bottled water, out-of-home consumption products, sauces, jam and honey, pudding, and powdered products under the Pinar brand name. The company also exports its products to 27 countries, including Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Qatar, Iraq, TRNC, Azerbaijan, Russia, Brazil, the People's Republic of China, the United States, and other countries. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Pinar SÃ¼t MamÃ¼lleri Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.

SELGD.IS.long_name: Selçuk Gida Endüstri Ihracat Ithalat A.S.
SELGD.IS.summary: SelÃ§uk Gida EndÃ¼stri Ihracat Ithalat A.S. produces and sells dried fruits in Turkey. It offers dried figs, apricots, sourcherries, and tomatoes; and pine kernels and sultanas under the EAGLE brand and various private labels through hyper-supermarkets and discount chains. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries, including Germany, the United Kingdom, Italy, France, Switzerland, Austria, Greece, Spain, the Netherlands, Belgium, Denmark, Norway, the United States, Australia, Argentina, Canada, Israel, China, Japan, and South Korea. SelÃ§uk Gida EndÃ¼stri Ihracat Ithalat A.S. was founded in 1932 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

TATGD.IS.summary: Tat Gida Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, marketing, trade, and brokerage of semi-finished and finished goods in Turkey and internationally. The company also provides canned foods, such as tomato paste, vegetables products, tomato products, ready foods, pickles, delicatessen, organic products, boiled products, and jams; and sauces, such as ketchup, mayonnaise, mustard, and condiment sauces under the TAT brand name. The company was formerly known as Tat Konserve Sanayii AS. and changed its name to Tat Gida Sanayi A.S. in November 2013. Tat Gida Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TKURU.IS.long_name: Taze Kuru Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
TKURU.IS.summary: Taze Kuru Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates in the food industry in Turkey. It offers fruits, vegetables, teas, snacks, soups, chocolates and powders, and campaigns, as well as gifts. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey.

TUKAS.IS.long_name: Tukas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
TUKAS.IS.summary: Tukas Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells food products. The company offers tomato and pepper pastes, dried and grated tomatoes, sauces, pickles, jams, and olives; canned products, including vegetables, delicatessen, pulses, and ready meals; ketchups, mayonnaises, and hot pepper and breakfast sauces; and roasted, boiled, ready to serve food, and frozen products. It sells its products under the Tukas brand name. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

ULUUN.IS.long_name: Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ULUUN.IS.summary: Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells wheat flour in Turkey. It offers chapati, biscuit, bread, noodle, and soft noodle flour products; and products for high gluten aqua feed and aqua feed, as well as home use products. The company exports its wheat flour to 72 countries in 5 continents from Far East to the Caribbean Islands covering Africa and the Middle East countries. Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Samsun, Turkey.
